
{{alias}}( x )
    Returns an approximate binary logarithm (base two) of a 32-bit integer `x`.

    This function provides a performance boost when an application requires
    only approximate computations for integer arguments.

    For applications requiring high-precision, this function is never suitable.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: integer
        Input value.

    Returns
    -------
    out: integer
        Integer binary logarithm (base two).

    Examples
    --------
    > var v = {{alias}}( 4 )
    2
    > v = {{alias}}( 8 )
    3

    See Also
    --------
